about.title: About me
about.description: Hi, I am Aksels. Born in Norway ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡´ but raised in Latvia. I am a motivated full-stack developer and student at the University of Latvia based in Riga, Latvia. My multicultural background has shaped my approach to problem-solving and collaboration. I focus on modern and user-friendly web applications, combining design principles with technical excellence. My education and work experience have provided me with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. I can develop interactive and responsive web applications using the latest technologies and applying best programming practices.

current.description: Studies focused on software development, algorithms, and data structures. The studies have given me skills in web application development and maintenance, as well as a good understanding of the software development process.

current.title: Full Stack Developer & QA Engineer
current.description: Developing and maintaining web applications using modern technologies such as PHP, Git, Yii2, React, and WordPress. Experience working on a variety of projects, including content management systems. Responsible for testing and debugging both web and mobile applications to ensure they meet quality standards. Skilled in regression testing, performance testing, security testing, as well as black box and white box testing.

previous.title: Web Developer Intern
previous.description: Developed an application using Zabbix API to get the most useful information about complex devices (such as switches). Gained experience with front-end and back-end technologies.

internship.title: IT Administrator Intern
internship.description: Provided technical support and assistance to employees. Helped with system maintenance and troubleshooting. Gained practical experience with various IT systems and tools.

carRepair.title: Car Repair and Maintenance
carRepair.description: I have a passion for car repair and maintenance. From standard maintenance to more complex repairs like gearbox replacement, I enjoy the challenge of diagnosing and solving car problems. This hobby has helped me develop strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

gym.title: Fitness
gym.description: I work out at the gym three times a week to stay in shape and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

other.title: Other Interests
other.description: When I'm not working on cars or at the gym, I enjoy exploring new technologies, reading about car innovations, and keeping up with the latest tech industry developments. I like reading books, cycling, and spending time with friends. Additionally, I'm learning Norwegian.

website.title: This Website
website.description: This portfolio website was built by me using React.js and styled-components for a modern, responsive design. It includes smooth animations, dark/light mode, and multilingual support (English, Latvian, and Norwegian) using i18next. The site is fully responsive and optimized for all devices, with a focus on performance and user experience.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach out through these channels
